title: Opt: React UX Reporting Pages
description: Create react page that starts with a fancy search and allows you to collect objects in a basket then when you have a basket you can point one or more or your research assistants at it and give them the task of analyzing and generating reports based on their specialty and they can collaborate to check each others work.
